sentences.sContent: The men in the fort capitulated.

synos.tran: 堡垒；[军]要塞；（美）边界贸易站

phrases.pCn: 劳德代尔堡（美国佛罗里达州东南沿海城市）

remMethod.val: 在重要的港口(port)修建堡垒(fort)

words.tran: 加强；增强；（酒）的酒精含量；设防于

trans.tranOther: a strong building or group of buildings used by soldiers or an army for defending an important place
